name: Kraken (itch)
description:
Kraken is a party game developed by 2 programmers and 2 artists in a gamejam competition. (Creative Jam, NAD, Montreal, 2017)

Three players play as a sailor trying to survive an attack from a dangerous kraken played by the fourth player. The kraken can drop several objects on the sinking boat where sailors are standing in order to sink them.

Programmers:    Maxim Daigle, Jean-Rene Choiniere
Artists:                    Gabriel Jacques, Eliane Nguyen
Sounds and musics:  Medhat Hanbali
